popover.primary: A mastery path focused on stabbin' things
A mastery path focused on survivability which means mor' killin' later
A mastery path focused on buffs and group support, cause everyone has some killin' ta do

data.name: Arm Breaka

data.name: Bring 'Em On

data.rawDescription: Whenever you Parry, you immediately put your "Best Plan" in motion.

data.name: Can't Hit Me!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Increase Block Chance by 50%. While you are channeling, you can move at 60% movement speed. After you block, the attacker takes 175 damage.
data.rawDescription: Increase Block Chance by {COM_0_VAL0}%. While you are channeling, you can move at 60% movement speed. After you block, the attacker takes {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Cant' Touch Us
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Group members within 100 feet will gain 200 Action Points and will absorb up to 3000 damage over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Group members within 100 feet will gain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS} and will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, making monsters hate you more. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.
data.rawDescription: You challenge all opponents in front of you, making monsters hate you more. While challenged, your opponents will deal only {COM_5_VAL0}% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after {COM_5_DURA_SECONDS} or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.
data.rawDescription:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Changin' Da Plan
data.description:
You suddenly realize that you could smash things better with a different plan.

No Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.
Da Good Plan: You gain Da Best Plan.
Da Best Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.
data.rawDescription:
You suddenly realize that you could smash things better with a different plan.

No Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.
Da Good Plan: You gain Da Best Plan.
Da Best Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.

data.name: Clobber
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Slashes for 152 damage, and generates extra hate against monsters.
data.rawDescription: Slashes for {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}, and generates extra hate against monsters.

data.name: Da Big Un'
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: A mighty leaping strike with your axe which deals 176 damage to all targets 25 feet in front of you.
data.rawDescription: A mighty leaping strike with your axe which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all targets {COM_0_RADI_FEET} in front of you.

data.name: Da Biggest!
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A mighty war cry that weakens your foes and gives you their strengths. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal 75 stat points from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.
data.rawDescription:
A mighty war cry that weakens your foes and gives you their strengths. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal {ABIL_3232_COM_0_VAL0} stat points from targets within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of you for {ABIL_3232_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Da Greenest
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A Waaaghy bellow that raises resistances when hit. Incoming attacks have a 25% chance to increase resistance against that type of damage by 236 for 10 seconds on all group members within 100 feet. Physical damage will increase armor by 618 for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.
data.rawDescription:
A Waaaghy bellow that raises resistances when hit. Incoming attacks have a 25% chance to increase resistance against that type of damage by {ABIL_3239_COM_0_VAL0} for {ABIL_3239_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} on all group members within 100 feet. Physical damage will increase armor by {ABIL_3242_COM_0_VAL0} for {ABIL_3242_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} for all group members within 100 feet.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Da Toughest!
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A grand war cry to proclaim yourself da toughest! All your attacks gain a 25% chance to increase your group's wounds by 162 for 10 seconds. Anyone affected will be healed by the amount increased.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.
data.rawDescription:
A grand war cry to proclaim yourself da toughest! All your attacks gain a 25% chance to increase your group's wounds by {ABIL_3844_COM_0_VAL0} for {ABIL_3844_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Anyone affected will be healed by the amount increased.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Dat Was Great!
data.description: Increases the duration of "Wot Armor?" by 10 seconds, and will now reduces target's toughness by 120.
data.rawDescription: Increases the duration of "Wot Armor?" by 10 seconds, and will now reduces target's toughness by {ABIL_1666_COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0}.

data.rawDescription: All targets within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you take {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and are Silenced, unable to use Magic for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.rawDescription: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them, reducing their damage to {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None

data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!

data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocks target down for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you {COM_2_VAL1}% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by {COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to {COM_1_RADI_FEET} away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by {COM_1_VAL0}% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
